name: Hide your fears
description:
In Hide your fears, you wake up after being knocked out by some stranger. You don't know where you are, only that a mysterious someone is helping you to escape. Listen to his guidance to escape from this nightmare.

Pay attention to your movements and actions as they are generating some noise, it could bring you troubles!

Controls:

Style 1:

  • Keyboard : 
    • [A][D] or[Left/Right Arrows] to rotate
    • [W] or [Up Arrow] to move forward
    • [S] or [Down Arrow] to turn back
    • [Shift] to run
    • [Space] to interact
  • XBox Controller:
    • [Left/Right Stick] to rotate
    • [Up Stick] to move forward
    • [Down Stick] to turn back
    • [A] to run
    • [B] to interact

Style 2:

  • Keyboard :
    •  Directional arrows or [W][A][S][D] to move
    • [Shift] to run
    • [Space] to interact
  • XBox Controller: 
    • Stick to move
    • [A] to run
    • [B] to interact
